_header: Sith mercy now in men doth rest
_description: Proverbial couplet on women’s passing on to men the capacity for mercy — one couplet

HunEL26A17.Transcription:
Since mercie nowe in men doth rest Assaie what lyes in womans
                    breste
HunEL26A17.Note: Added by a hand of the sixteenth century.
HunEL26A17.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 251.
